hadiths.text: Narrated `Abdul `Aziz:It was said to Anas "What did you hear the Prophet (ﷺ) saying about garlic?" Anas replied, "Whoever has eaten (garlic) should not approach our mosque

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُكْرَهُ مِنَ الثُّومِ وَالْبُقُولِ
chapter.eng-name: The eating of garlic or other (bad smelling vegetables).
